description: This Python source file defines an asynchronous document retriever for a knowledge base related to Thai recipes, including setup for embedding, vector database connection, and an async main function demonstrating agent usage.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class used to perform queries and generate responses.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class representing a knowledge base loaded from PDF URLs.

classes.name: Qdrant
classes.description: A class representing a connection to the Qdrant vector database.

classes.name: AsyncQdrantClient
classes.description: An asynchronous client for interacting with Qdrant.

methods.name: retriever
methods.description: An asynchronous function to retrieve relevant documents from the vector database based on a query.

methods.name: amain
methods.description: An asynchronous main function demonstrating agent usage with knowledge base loading and querying.

methods.name: main
methods.description: A synchronous wrapper that runs the asynchronous main function.
